docs.text: Welcome to DragonRuby Socket Extension docs
docs.title: Welcome to DragonRuby Socket Extension docs
Welcome to DragonRuby Socket Extension docs

docs.text: $socket.raw see main.rb for a working example including most of the following features $socket.raw.host_create({address: "pass.ip.address.here:port"}) $socket.raw.host_connect({address: "pass.ip.address.here:port"}) $socket.raw.host_service next_event = $socket.raw.host_service $socket.raw.peer_send(peer_to_send_to, {data: {message: "hello peer"}}) $socket.raw.peer_disconnect(peer_to_disconnect)
docs.title: raw

docs.text: see main.rb for a working example including most of the following features $socket.raw.host_create({address: "pass.ip.address.here:port"}) $socket.raw.host_connect({address: "pass.ip.address.here:port"}) $socket.raw.host_service next_event = $socket.raw.host_service $socket.raw.peer_send(peer_to_send_to, {data: {message: "hello peer"}}) $socket.raw.peer_disconnect(peer_to_disconnect)
docs.title: $socket.raw

docs.text: $socket.raw.client $socket.raw.client.start({ port: 1234, max_clients: 32, }) $socket.raw.client.end $socket.raw.client.update $socket.raw.client.send({ data: { x: args.inputs.mouse.x, y: args.inputs.mouse.y, pressed: args.inputs.mouse.button_left, } } )
docs.title: $socket.raw.client

docs.text: $socket.raw.client.start({ port: 1234, max_clients: 32, }) $socket.raw.client.end $socket.raw.client.update $socket.raw.client.send({ data: { x: args.inputs.mouse.x, y: args.inputs.mouse.y, pressed: args.inputs.mouse.button_left, } } )
